meanings.definition: A large container for transporting goods, typically made of metal.
meanings.sent1: The workers loaded the bennes onto the truck for the big delivery.
meanings.sent2: The bennes at the construction site were filled with sand and gravel.
meanings.sent3: The bennes decided to have a race to see who could carry the most items.
meanings.sent4: The bennes lined up like soldiers ready for battle, each one eager to prove its strength.
meanings.sent5: The shiny bennes gleamed in the sunlight, ready to carry their precious cargo.

meanings.definition: The seeds of a tropical plant used for oil production.
meanings.sent1: The farmers harvested the bennes to extract the valuable oil.
meanings.sent2: The bennes were carefully processed to create high-quality cooking oil.
meanings.sent3: The bennes whispered to each other, excited to become a delicious ingredient.
meanings.sent4: The bennes were like tiny treasures waiting to be turned into liquid gold.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bennes filled the air, promising a flavorful meal ahead.

meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed a variety of bennes in their window.
meanings.sent2: The bennes were a popular choice for dessert at the French restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous bennes played hide-and-seek in the cookie jar.
meanings.sent4: The bennes melted in your mouth, leaving a sweet memory behind.
meanings.sent5: The delicate bennes crumbled easily, revealing their buttery goodness.
